lexUnit.name: cross.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: go to the other side of (a bridge or obstacle).

sentence.text: Crossings took the traditional form ( Figure 6.11 ) : there is no doubt here as to whom the road is for , or that walkers may only cross when permitted to do so by car drivers .
